game.path: ./Wyv and Keep - The Temple of the Lost Idol.sh
game.name: Wyv and Keep - The Temple of the Lost Idol
game.desc: Command treasure hunters Wyv and Keep through an ancient Amazonian temple in search of the Lost Idol! Use quick reflexes and teamwork to conquer a gauntlet of 60 fiendish puzzles and deadly traps. Unlock the secrets of the mystical Xu'hutl pygmies and their terrifying overlord, the great Quetzecola.
